Robotic Manipulation

  • 25 Sep 2015
  • project

About:

  • A robotics software library developed as part of Robotic Manipulation course at Northwestern University (NU)

  • The library is done in Python language

  • The assignments and project involved using the functions created from software library to simulate and animate UR5 and WAM robots in Rviz

  • The following animations demonstrate use of functions from the library using UR5 robot in Rviz:
